name: BlogPositive
tagline: It's positive! It's blogging software! It's only for Haiku!
body:
# BlogPositive
BlogPositive is a (work in progress) blogging software for the (work in progress) Haiku OS.

# Install
To install, just run:

    jam && ./obj.X86/BlogPositive
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
